mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.company_name as "company_name", e.employment_title as "employment_title", e.employment_contents as "employment_contents", c.company_id as "company_id", e.hope_job, e.employment_id as "employment_id" FROM company c Join employments e ON c.company_id = e.company_id Join resume r ON e.hope_job = r.hope_job WHERE r.member_id = #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select e.EMPLOYMENT_ID,e.EMPLOYMENT_TITLE,e.EMPLOYMENT_CONTENTS,e.HOPE_CAREER,e.HOPE_GRADUATE, e.HOPE_JOB_POSITION,e.HOPE_JOB,e.HOPE_LOCATION,e.HOPE_WORK_TYPE,e.EMPLOYMENT_PREFER,e.EMPLOYMENT_TIME, c.COMPANY_NAME,c.COMPANY_TEL,c.COMPANY_EMAIL,c.CEO_NAME,c.BUSINESS_TYPE, c.COMPANY_ADDR,c.BUSINESS_CATEGORY,c.COMPANY_BIRTH,c.COMPANY_SALES, c.HOMEPAGE,c.COMPANY_DATE from employments e, company c where e.company_id = c.company_id and e.employment_id = #{employment_id}
